content: this bandana is the perfect summer stash-busting project it is lightweight and uses around 100 yards of yarn the pattern is written for fingering weight yarn but instructions are included so that the pattern can be modified for different weights **yarn ** hobbii rainbow deluxe cotton in color 35 winter mint 3 5 mm needles us 4 **stitches ** this pattern uses the following stitches co cast on k knit p purl sl slip_stitch yo yarn over p2tog purl 2 stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together **accessibility ** a low vision accessible lva version of this pattern is available this version has been modified in the following ways size 24 arial font black font plain white background left-justified text no italics no abbreviations used photo descriptions page numbers on all pages
